decks.notes: The deck focuses on aggressively developing and maintaining board presence using a combination of low-cost creatures and burn spells. With Ghyrson Starn, Kelermorph as the commander, the deck aims to quickly deploy threats like Kari Zev, Skyship Raider, True-Name Nemesis, and Goblin Bombardment to chip away at the opponent's life total. The inclusion of cards like Lightning Bolt, Forked Bolt, and Fiery Confluence ensures that the deck has enough direct damage to handle threats and deal with opposing creatures efficiently. The deck also benefits from cards like Faerie Seer and Spyglass Siren to provide card advantage and disruption to the opponent's strategy. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggression and burn spells.

This deck focuses on gaining control of the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. Atraxa, Grand Unifier serves as the commander to help stabilize the board and generate card advantage over time. The deck includes a variety of powerful spells such as Force of Will, Cryptic Command, and Supreme Verdict to control the flow of the game. Additionally, there are efficient removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Fatal Push to deal with threats on the board. The mana base is built to support the control strategy, with a mix of dual lands and fetch lands to ensure consistent access to the necessary colors of mana.

The deck focuses on controlling the board with counterspells, removal, and disruptive creatures while setting up a strong aggro game plan. Dennick, Pious Apprentice leads the charge with supportive cards like Mother of Runes and Palace Jailer. The deck combines aggressive creatures like True-Name Nemesis and Adeline, Resplendent Cathar with versatile removal like Swords to Plowshares and Prismatic Ending to maintain board presence and pressure the opponent. It also includes powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler and Jace, the Mind Sculptor to provide card advantage and control the game. By disrupting the opponent's strategy and applying pressure with efficient creatures, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory in 1 vs 1 Duel Commander games.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a wide array of low-cost creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The Commander, Juri, Master of the Revue, enhances the strategy by sacrificing creatures for extra value and dealing damage whenever creatures die. The deck includes a mix of efficient removal spells to control the board and resilient creatures that can come back from the graveyard. The mana base consists of both black and red dual lands to ensure a smooth curve of plays. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to apply early pressure, keep the opponent on the back foot, and finish them off with a combination of burn spells and creature attacks.
